notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This work was supported by a grant from the Italian Ministry of Research [Grant PRIN 2017 #20173ZECCM Tracking biological barriers to antigen delivery by nanotechnological vaccines (NanoTechVax)] and by Research Funding for University of Catania (Piano per la Ricerca 2016–2018—Linea Di Intervento 2 “Dotazione Ordinaria” cod. 57722172106). Cinzia Cimino was supported by the PhD program in Biotechnology, XXXVI cycle, University of Catania.
